name: PROJECT WATCHER
description:
Kill them all...

Like a lot of other projects on this site, PROJECT WATCHER started as a small hobby project. But after around 1,5 years (and a lot of fun creating it), we have decided to share our work with others.

Main inspirations come from SERIOUS SAM. There will be a lot of enemies, guns, and secrets to uncover.

Right now we are working on finishing the demo, and we will try to upload it as soon as possible.

You can follow the game progress here:

https://twitter.com/WATCHERFPP
